ItemBGDesc: In Mr. Xiyan's story, this is the weapon you and {TEXTJOIN#59} managed to forge. You can tell at a glance that this dark and faded {TEXTJOIN#61} has a legendary past.\nOriginally there were LEDs in there. They light up if you press the switch and looked really fancy. Then the batteries went flat and Mr. Xiyan hasn't gotten around to change them yet.
